Test that an attribution link with invalid attribution expiry triggers an issue.
Issue reported: {
    code : AttributionReportingIssue
    details : {
        attributionReportingIssueDetails : {
            frame : <object>
            invalidParameter : Must be a number, not a string
            violatingNodeId : <number>
            violationType : InvalidAttributionSourceExpiry
        }
    }
}
